cause.description:
E The People is a public forum for democratic and deliberative discussion. The conversations on E The People explore the political issues we see in the news, rejecting the traditional spin and conventional wisdom that tends to fill the airwaves. We have built E The People in a way that allows members to have maximum control over the topics and frames for discussion; it's our attempt at a citizen-driven town hall.
For more information, read about us here: http://www.e-thepeople.org/about/fullstory
1. Authenticity over rhetoric
2. Curiosity over bias
3. Ideas over spin
4. Respect over spin
5. Listening over yelling
6. Empowerment over activation
7. Interactive over broadcast
8. Principal over expedience
9. Exchange over receive
